Kitchen Employee Hanna:
That lad over there is Brodien. I've never seen an elf like him. So curious and playful. He says he's still growing, but that's all elves for you. He may look like that, but I bet he's pretty old.
Lupia is an Ertheia. It's a race that people say has disappeared a long time ago. I was so surprised to see Lupia at first.
Well, go meet them. How about talking to Mei first?
